wikipedia_page.main: William Hunter, Lord Hunter,  (9 October 1865 – 10 April 1957) was a Scottish advocate, judge and Liberal Party politician.

response: * William Hunter, Lord Hunter (1865–1957), Scottish politician and judge
* The Jallianwala Bagh massacre Hunter Commission, a 1919 investigation into a British massacre that killed 1600 Indian civilians headed by William Hunter, Lord Hunter
